Multi-Timer

Manage your time while multitasking

 v1.0.1

  • Multiple named timers
  • Add and delete timers at will
  • Add accompanying notes
  • Make timer reoccuring
  • Get notified
  • Hide inactive timers
  • Reorder timers
  • Persistent state
macOS

The latest version is built only for MacOS.

Previous version incl. Windows application
